item.title: Configure autoscaling for personal AVD host pools automated
item.description: Autoscaling for pooled AVD host pools is GA for a while now. Since 18 July 2023 a new autoscale mechanism became in Public Preview for AVD personal host pools. Currently it is only supported to configure autoscale for personal host pools by using the portal. There are no API’s or PowerShell modules available (yet) to automate the creation or mutating personal scaling plans or schedules.
